nonCompete.message: Non-competes VOID except in very limited circumstances
nonCompete.detailedExplanation: Oklahoma law makes non-compete agreements void except: (1) sale of business or dissolution of partnership, (2) protection of trade secrets (narrowly defined), (3) employees with access to confidential information who earn $100k+ (executive/management), (4) physicians under specific conditions.
nonCompete.requirement: Can only use for: business sale, trade secrets, executives earning $100k+, or physicians
nonCompete.actionRequired: Remove non-compete OR verify exception applies (business sale, trade secrets, exec $100k+)
nonCompete.alternativeLanguage: confidentiality obligations (non-compete generally void in Oklahoma)

drugScreening.detailedExplanation: Oklahoma Standards for Workplace Drug and Alcohol Testing Act provides liability protections
drugScreening.bestPractice: Consider certified program for legal protections

finalPay.message: Final wages due next regular payday

rightToWork.message: Oklahoma is RIGHT TO WORK state

breaks.message: Meal and rest breaks required for minors, recommended for adults
breaks.detailedExplanation: Minors under 16: rest breaks required. Adults: not required but recommended. Federal law requires breaks under 20 minutes be paid if provided.
